verses.verse: Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> at <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%> Now <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation;<s%> and they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> thus <S%H7378>contended<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3863>"If<s%> <S%H3863>only<s%> we had <S%H1478>perished<s%> when our <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> then have you <S%H935>brought<s%> the Lord's <S%H6951>assembly<s%> into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> for us and our <S%H1165>beasts<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>here<s%>?

"And <S%H4100>why<s%> have you made us <S%H5927>come<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>wretched<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>? It is not a <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2233>grain<s%> or <S%H8384>figs<s%> or <S%H1612>vines<s%> or <S%H7416>pomegranates,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> is <S%H369>there<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%> Then the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to them;
and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H4294>rod;<s%> and you and your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5553>rock<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that it may <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H4325>water.<s%> You shall thus <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for them out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> and let the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> <S%H8248>drink.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him;

and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H5553>rock.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> you <S%H4784>rebels;<s%> shall we <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for you out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%>?"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod;<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> <S%H8354>drank.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have not <S%H539>believed<s%> Me, to <S%H6942>treat<s%> Me as <S%H6942>holy<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> you shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them."

<S%H1992>Those<s%> [were] the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He <S%H6942>proved<s%> Himself <S%H6942>holy<s%> among them.

From <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> then <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom:<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> 'You <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>hardship<s%> that has <S%H4672>befallen<s%> us;

that our fathers <S%H1>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3381>Egypt,<s%> and we <S%H4714>stayed<s%> in <S%H3427>Egypt<s%> a <S%H4714>long<s%> <S%H7227>time,<s%> and the <S%H3117>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4714>treated<s%> us and our fathers <S%H7489>badly.<s%>

'But when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out from <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are at <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> a <S%H5892>town<s%> on the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of your <S%H1366>territory.<s%>

<S%H4994>'Please<s%> let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land.<s%> We shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> or through <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> we shall not even <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from a <S%H875>well.<s%> We shall <S%H1980>go<s%> along the king's <S%H1870>highway,<s%> not <S%H5186>turning<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or <S%H8040>left,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> we <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> your <S%H1366>territory.<s%>' "

<S%H9000>Edom,<s%> however, <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> us, <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3318>come<s%> out with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H7122>against<s%> you."

Again, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up by the <S%H4546>highway,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> I and my <S%H4735>livestock<s%> do <S%H8354>drink<s%> any of your <S%H4325>water,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>pay<s%> its <S%H4377>price.<s%> Let me <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> [else.]"

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through.<s%>" And <S%H9000>Edom<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7122>against<s%> him with a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5971>force,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Thus <S%H9000>Edom<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>allow<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> his <S%H1366>territory;<s%> so <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> from him.

Now when they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H175>"Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people;<s%> for he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> My <S%H6310>command<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah.<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor;<s%>

and <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar.<s%> So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> will be <S%H622>gathered<s%> [to his people,] and will <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> "

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

And after <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H7218>top.<s%> Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had <S%H1478>died,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
